item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 2nd May
item.description:

item.title: Wide Pothole, tarmac crumbling just before speed bump, 2nd May
item.description:
Down Churchdown Lane. Just before the speed bump after the bridge (coming from churchdown to Hucclecote). Looks like where previous pothole was repaired porrly and crumbled away. Damaged my car had to get new tyre. Been present for least a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 2nd May
item.description:
IN HOUSE ARB TEAM:BGG: On the Plum Cherry tree remove the two broken branches and dead wood and reduce the overall crown by your own judgement when branches and dead wood is removed.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The roundabout at Telstar Way now has multiple holes and gauges which are affecting motorcycle lines turning and dangerous to navigate, 2nd May
item.description:
Several points around the roundabout of Telstar Way near to GCHQ. The ruts and holes in the road nearly caused a motorcycle crash today
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
